author: Warhammer
description:
In the grim darkness of the far future, there is only war! Few weapons go a long time without firing salvos into the enemy, and there’re some awesome ways of showing that through painting. Tune in to see Ollie paint three different gun barrel effects that you can add to your minis to make them look truly battle scarred. 

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Base:
Abaddon Black
Runelord Brass

Layer:
Dorn Yellow
Evil Sunz Scarlet
Stormhost Silver
Troll Slayer Orange
Yriel Yellow

Contrast:
Leviadon Blue
Leviathan purple

Shade:
Seraphim Sepia

Extra:
S Layer Brush
M Glaze Brush
M Base Brush
M Shade Brush
M Dry Brush
Lahmian Medium 

If you enjoyed this and want to learn more, our YouTube channel has an array of beginner-friendly videos to get you started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@warhammerofficial
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
- Warh
title: How to Paint Weapon Barrel Damage | Warhammer 40,000
